actions.text: Amendment SA 3461 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 135.

Amendment SA 3461 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3197 to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 3197. (consideration: CR S7071-7077; text: CR S7071-7072) In the nature of a substitute.

Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3461 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3197 to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 3197.

amends_amendment.purpose: To strike sections 842 relative to a conforming standard for waiver of domestic source or content requirement and 843 relative to the consistency with United States obligations under trade agreements.

purpose: In the nature of a substitute.
